name: Mortimer Dark (v0.1)
description:
NOTE: Game ends when the screen fades out to white. Didn't have time to configure this correctly. Made for the Pixel Game Maker MV development challenge. 

Mortimer Dark is an action adventure game set the world of Alteria, where all manner of creatures hide in the darkness. Explore a unique and twisted world, complete dungeons and gain new abilities all whilst trying to resurrect your late wife who was taken by the plague now spreading across the land.

  • Original Graphics
  • Unique, twisted and dark world
  • Dungeons and ability upgrades
  • Satisfying combat

XBOX Controller and Keyboard Compatible
